alert.note: Alert for Lavaca (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 10:12AM CST until January 26 at 5:21PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Navidad River at Strane Park affecting Jackson County. Navidad River near Speaks affecting Jackson and Lavaca Counties. Navidad River at Sublime affecting Lavaca County. Lavaca River near Edna affecting Jackson County. For the Navidad River...including Sublime, Speaks, Morales, Strane Park...Major flooding is forecast. For the Lavaca River...including Komensky, Breslau, Hallettsville, Edna...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Navidad River at Sublime. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Major lowland flooding continues with the river one quarter mile wide at the Highway 90A bridge threatending livstock from the headwaters to below Speaks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 31.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 20.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM CST Thursday was 31.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 8.3 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 31.2 feet on 11/01/1981. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Navidad River Sublime 24.0 31.1 Thu 9 am CST 20.0 10.7 9.6 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by this eveninglate tonight at 415 AM CST.
